body_text:
I think this is not the best level of reuse; having a function that verified objects with signatures, and maybe a shorthand for fetching and parsing JSON from the API, would be a little cleaner (less state to keep in your head when trying to understand the function, etc.).
I'm haven't yet found a great articulation for that feeling though, so I wouldn't call it a blocker.
